string.text: The battle is cancelled. Candidate is startled and haven't arrived to the arena.
10 seconds have passed!
20 seconds have passed!
30 seconds have passed!
40 seconds have passed!
50 seconds have passed!
A minute has passed!
A minute and 10 seconds passed!
A minute and 20 seconds have passed!
A minute and a half passed!
The battle has begun!

Attention everyone! The new round begins soon on the Arena! Blood-thirsty and always hungry Bloodsucker in the left corner! And, is it a man in the right corner? \nOh, yes it is! Everyone calls him Branded one!
Attention everyone! The new round begins soon on the Arena! He is familiar with kung-fu, he can bend the spoons, he's Burer! And a hero, whos pursue will never \nend! Everyone calls him Branded one!
And so! The opponent has defeated the candidate. That was worth seeing!
And so! The contender managed to knock down the enemy, but failed to fit in the time given and therefore lost!

Attention everyone! The new round begins soon on the Arena! A warm and fuzzy, but extremely spiteful Pseudo-dog in the left corner! And the came-from-nowhere \nand going-to-nowhere man in the right corner. Everyone calls him Branded one!
Attention everyone! The new round begins soon on the Arena! You know him, and you love him. While he hates you. The Beast in the left corner! And in the right \ncorner, still alive, Branded one!
Attention everyone! The new round begins soon on the Arena! An expert of matrial arts and proper nurition Snork in the left corner! And a man without the past. \nEveryone calls him Branded one!
Time is up! The contender has lost, but is still struggling for his life!
And so! The candidate was in time to knock down the opponent and won the match!
As you wish.
Stalker, brol! I beg you, don’t go, help us out! Anarchists shook down our helicopter and are about to take us out. We’ve got casualties, assistance needed!
Hehe, that's it. You copter is done with! Now you'll get yours, governmental rats!
Well okay Wolfhound that's it. The military copter is comming here. Now they'll crush you like dummies!
Guys, ecologist has run away! All after him, c'mon!
Branded One, help me! They're trying to kill me!
You'll live well without it, jackal. Finish your school first and then pose demands.
If you attack, I’ll destroy the data. You'll get no business with my documents.
If you don't want me to destroy the research results, just stay away.
Wolfhound, withdraw your dogs, until they've got their tails in place!
That's it, the talks are over. Now guns start speaking.
Buddy, get over here! Got a matter for ye. Lets smash those governmental rats together.
Branded one. You, son of a bitch, will pay for that setup-trap.
They're chasing us! Stop them, Branded One!
Listen, bookworm. Either you give me the results or leave here inside the plastic bag.
Gruglov, I don't know Latin, but I pretty much know the language of guns. Isn't it fancy enough? Or will you give to me the information amicably?
Professor, make use of your wits. Dish out the data and be free to go.

Kruglov, haven't you dug it yet?! We've knocked down your bloody copter and we demand the information that you're transporting. Once you hand it over to \nus, you can turn loose around with your guys. This is your last chance to get out of here, gimme the damn flash-drive and get lost.
Urgently rush here! Near the Radar my guys have caught a crazy stalker, now trying to interrogate him.
Branded one, are you off the hook? Stop shooting immediately! This is an order!
Branded one, stop firing right now! If you disobey the order, you are dead!
Branded one. You are banished from the grouping for violating the code of Duty. From now on you are our enemy.
Branded one, you just disobeyed the order! Now you die! The Duty never forgive it!
Stop firing! On the territory of Duty shooting is prohibited! The disobeying will be punished!
Attention! For violating the law on weapon usage on the territory of the Duty, Branded one has been proclaimed a criminal.
Attention! A murderer has been found! Everyone within the Duty perimeter is ordered to eliminate the murderer!
Stalker, help! We were attacked by the mercenaries, good few of us died. Help us, we won't stay in debt.
Help us to break through the ambush near the factory, I've copied coordinates to you. Be careful, Wolfhound with the thugs is near the copter.
